message: Bob, I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. Let's wrap this up in round one. Consider the impact of inflation on your share if you decline.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split in your favor.  I'm sure you realize the money will be worth less for both of us if we delay further.
Bob, while I appreciate the gesture, the split isn't favorable enough considering the rapid devaluation of your share. Let's see what round 3 brings.
Bob, time is running out, especially for you. I'm proposing 65/35. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances. Accept it, and we both walk away with something.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this 58/42 split in your favor and let's end this. Every round costs us both. Don't get greedy.
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain. I accept the 58/42 split.
